languages.text: {n}Клерк неожиданно прытко отдергивает инфопластину и сгорбливается, закрывая ее своим телом.{/n} "Нет, это устройство уже внесено в опись, его нельзя забирать! Я... я?.. Да, я вынужден зафиксировать попытку хищения в протоколе! Продиктуйте имя нарушителя и род деятельности".

{n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."
languages.original_text: {n}Клерк неожиданно прытко отдергивает инфопластину и сгорбливается, закрывая ее своим телом.{/n} "Нет, это устройство уже внесено в опись, его нельзя забирать! Я... я?.. Да, я вынужден зафиксировать попытку хищения в протоколе! Продиктуйте имя нарушителя и род деятельности".

I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

{n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

{n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

languages.text: {n}書記官は驚くほど素早くデータスレートを引き抜き、それを守るように身をかがめた。{/n}「いけません！この装置はすでに目録に記載されており、持ち出すことは許されません！私が―私が？　そ、そうだ、記録に窃盗未遂として書き留めねば！犯人の氏名と職業を明確に申告してください！」

traits.locale_text: {n}書記官は驚くほど素早くデータスレートを引き抜き、それを守るように身をかがめた。{/n}「いけません！この装置はすでに目録に記載されており、持ち出すことは許されません！私が―私が？　そ、そうだ、記録に窃盗未遂として書き留めねば！犯人の氏名と職業を明確に申告してください！」

languages.text: {n}El funcionario aparta la tablilla de datos con una agilidad sorprendente y se encorva con gesto protector.{/n} «¡No! ¡Este dispositivo ya está en el inventario y no se debe retirar! De... ¿debo? Sí, ¡debo tomar nota de este intento de robo! Indique claramente el nombre y la profesión de la persona responsable».
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}El funcionario aparta la tablilla de datos con una agilidad sorprendente y se encorva con gesto protector.{/n} «¡No! ¡Este dispositivo ya está en el inventario y no se debe retirar! De... ¿debo? Sí, ¡debo tomar nota de este intento de robo! Indique claramente el nombre y la profesión de la persona responsable».

languages.text: {n}Le greffier retire la plaque de données d'un geste aussi brusque que surprenant et la protège de son corps.{/n} « Non ! Cet appareil se trouve déjà sur la liste et ne doit pas être retiré ! Je... je... Oui, je dois rajouter cette tentative de vol à nos archives ! Merci d'énoncer clairement le nom et la profession {mf|du contrevenant|de la contrevenante}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le greffier retire la plaque de données d'un geste aussi brusque que surprenant et la protège de son corps.{/n} « Non ! Cet appareil se trouve déjà sur la liste et ne doit pas être retiré ! Je... je... Oui, je dois rajouter cette tentative de vol à nos archives ! Merci d'énoncer clairement le nom et la profession {mf|du contrevenant|de la contrevenante}. »

languages.text: {n}眼前的职员以迅雷不及掩耳的速度抽走了数据板，弓着身子，死死地护住了它。{/n}“不行！这台设备已经列入资源清单之中，不得移除！我……我……没错，我必须将这起盗窃未遂事件记录在案！请以清楚的方式，告知犯罪者的姓名和职业。”
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的职员以迅雷不及掩耳的速度抽走了数据板，弓着身子，死死地护住了它。{/n}“不行！这台设备已经列入资源清单之中，不得移除！我……我……没错，我必须将这起盗窃未遂事件记录在案！请以清楚的方式，告知犯罪者的姓名和职业。”

languages.text: {n} Der Beamte zieht den Datablock mit einer erstaunlichen Behändigkeit zurück und beugt sich schützend darüber.{/n} "Nein! Dieses Gerät steht bereits auf der Inventarliste und darf nicht entfernt werden! Ich ... ich? Ja, ich muss einen versuchten Diebstahl vermerken! Bitte nennt mir Namen und Beruf des Täters."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n} Der Beamte zieht den Datablock mit einer erstaunlichen Behändigkeit zurück und beugt sich schützend darüber.{/n} "Nein! Dieses Gerät steht bereits auf der Inventarliste und darf nicht entfernt werden! Ich ... ich? Ja, ich muss einen versuchten Diebstahl vermerken! Bitte nennt mir Namen und Beruf des Täters."

languages.text: {n}Kâtip, şaşırtıcı bir çeviklikle databelayı kapıyor ve korumacı bir tavırla üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} "Olmaz! Bu cihaz, envanter listesinde kayıtlı ve yerinden oynatılamaz! Ben... Ben mi? Evet, kayıtlara hırsızlık teşebbüsü olarak not düşmeliyim! Rica ederim failin adını ve mesleğini açıkça beyan edin."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk yanks the data-slate away with surprising agility and hunches protectively over it.{/n} "No! This device is already on the inventory list and must not be removed! I— I? Yes, I must make a note of attempted theft on the record! Please state clearly the offender's name and occupation."

Ben mi? Evet, kayıtlara hırsızlık teşebbüsü olarak not düşmeliyim! Rica ederim failin adını ve mesleğini açıkça beyan edin."
